scripts.dev: npm run dev --w=@web3modal/core & npm run dev --w=@web3modal/ui & npm run dev --w=@web3modal/ethereum & npm run dev --w=@web3modal/react
scripts.pre-publish: npm run lint; npm run typecheck; npm run prettier; npm run new-version; npm install; npm run build;
scripts.publish:latest: lerna exec -- npm publish --no-private --access public --tag latest
scripts.publish:canary: lerna exec -- npm publish --no-private --access public --tag canary
scripts.clean: rm -rf `find . -type d -name node_modules -o -name dist -o -name .next -o -name out`; rm package-lock.json
